name: Nitin Shandilya
relationship: Worked with Prathik (senior, not direct manager)
quote: Having worked directly with Prathik, I can confidently say he is an excellent team player. He displayed ownership and attention to detail, navigated challenges in a fast-paced environment, and consistently delivered quality work.

name: Pradeep Kumar R.
title: Technology Executive | Digital Platforms & Product Innovation Leader | BITS Pilani
quote: Prathik stood out for sharp thinking, strong ownership, and eagerness to learn. He takes initiative, explores problems deeply, and consistently follows through on commitments. He adapts quickly and makes a valuable addition to any team.

name: Adithiya Guru Patham
title: Software Development Engineer | Java, Spring Boot, AWS, GCP
relationship: Worked with Prathik (senior, not direct manager)
quote: Prathik is highly skilled and dedicated. His expertise in Java, Python, and Spring Boot is commendable, and he has a strong sense of responsibility and ownership. He collaborates effectively and brings a proactive approach to challenging work.
